about.title: About
about.text1: My name is Lucia and I'm a
about.text2: graduated from Coderhouse, school where I'm still studying to perfect myself and learning about new tecnologies.
about.text4: is advanced since I've lived and worked in the United States for two years and a half.
about.text5: I consider myself an active and curious person! I enjoy planning, investigating and ejecuting every single one of my projects.
about.text6: In 2018, I joined the Au Pair program, where I worked with an American family. Being away from home, in a country with a different culture and language, shaped me into a more
about.text7: . On this trip, I had the oportunity to meet a lot of people in the IT business who inspired me to follow this path.
about.text8: When I'm not coding, I like speding time outside with my cats, skate in my rollerblades or read Stephen King novels.
